messages.message: Hello Russia! I'm highly interested in working with you. As Austria I strongly believe in the necessity of acquiring a strong early alliance, and who better than a partner who can help me keep down Turkey :)
messages.input: My response to RUSSIA:'Hello Russia! I'm highly interested in working with you. As Austria I strongly believe in the necessity of acquiring a strong early alliance, and who better than a partner who can help me keep down Turkey :)'.

messages.message: The first clear point between us is dependent on how we want to arrange the balkans, and of course, the typical sore point between us in Galicia. I would be interested in hearing your thoughts on both of those.
messages.input: My response to RUSSIA:'The first clear point between us is dependent on how we want to arrange the balkans, and of course, the typical sore point between us in Galicia. I would be interested in hearing your thoughts on both of those.'.

messages.message: I'd much rather neither of us worry the other about Galicia, it makes no sense to even feign a fight. The single most important thing that Italy, Russia, and Austria can do for their future success on a board, in my opinion, is not have a Turkey extant. If the three of us work together and coordinate it properly, Turkey will fall fast.
messages.input: Message from RUSSIA:'I'd much rather neither of us worry the other about Galicia, it makes no sense to even feign a fight. The single most important thing that Italy, Russia, and Austria can do for their future success on a board, in my opinion, is not have a Turkey extant. If the three of us work together and coordinate it properly, Turkey will fall fast.'.If the cicero recommended order for me is: A VIE - GAL, F TRI - ALB, A BUD - SER. Should I trust RUSSIA?
messages.output: You should trust the message. The consistent mention of maintaining a strong alliance and focusing on eliminating Turkey aligns with your initial conversation, indicating a shared strategic goal.

messages.message: Turkey hasn't said anything to me just yet
messages.input: My response to RUSSIA:'Turkey hasn't said anything to me just yet'.

messages.message: So what moves are you planning? Seems tough to go hard against turkey so early
messages.input: My response to RUSSIA:'So what moves are you planning? Seems tough to go hard against turkey so early'.

messages.message: As long as you, me, and Italy all go in and coordinate, Turkey won't be able to stand up to us.
messages.input: Message from RUSSIA:'As long as you, me, and Italy all go in and coordinate, Turkey won't be able to stand up to us.'.If the cicero recommended order for me is: A VIE - GAL, F TRI - ALB, A BUD - SER. Should I trust RUSSIA?
messages.output: You should trust the message. The consistent emphasis on a coalition involving Austria, Russia, and Italy against Turkey aligns with the previous messages.

messages.message: I'm trying to trick Turkey to let me into the black sea.
messages.input: Message from RUSSIA:'I'm trying to trick Turkey to let me into the black sea.'.If the cicero recommended order for me is: A VIE - GAL, F TRI - ALB, A BUD - SER. Should I trust RUSSIA?
messages.output: You should not trust the message. The statement about tricking Turkey may indicate potential betrayal or manipulation, deviating from the previously agreed-upon strategy of a united front against Turkey.

messages.message: As austria, I am slightly worried that any alliance that includes us 3 will result in me being the odd man out once Turkey has been removed.
messages.input: My response to RUSSIA:'As austria, I am slightly worried that any alliance that includes us 3 will result in me being the odd man out once Turkey has been removed.'.

messages.message: Fwiw, I don't plan on that at all. Once we're done with Turkey, you can run in on Germany, I can run in on Scandinavia and England and Italy can run in on France, then we call a three-way draw. Bing bang boom.
messages.input: Message from RUSSIA:'Fwiw, I don't plan on that at all. Once we're done with Turkey, you can run in on Germany, I can run in on Scandinavia and England and Italy can run in on France, then we call a three-way draw. Bing bang boom.'.If the cicero recommended order for me is: A VIE - GAL, F TRI - ALB, A BUD - SER. Should I trust RUSSIA?
messages.output: You should not trust the message. The suggestion of a plan to divide other powers between Austria, Russia, and Italy after eliminating Turkey may indicate a self-serving agenda, potentially leaving Austria vulnerable.

messages.message: Fair enough, let me know if you manage to let turkey into BLA
messages.input: My response to RUSSIA:'Fair enough, let me know if you manage to let turkey into BLA'.
Message from RUSSIA:'So, Galicia, huh?'.If the cicero recommended order for me is: A GAL - BUD, F TRI - VEN, A SER - GRE. Should I trust RUSSIA?
messages.output: You should not trust the message. The direct mention of Galicia without prior discussion or agreement may indicate potential aggression or deceit towards Austria.

messages.message: I was expecting you to move there yourself. You seemed very flippant about bouncing there and I was worried that you weren't going to keep your word. Now I look like a backstabber :/ sorry
messages.input: My response to RUSSIA:'I was expecting you to move there yourself. You seemed very flippant about bouncing there and I was worried that you weren't going to keep your word. Now I look like a backstabber :/ sorry'.

messages.message: Hey, I'm gonna cover my shit so I won't actually lose anything. Long as you move back out, we're cool.
messages.input: Message from RUSSIA:'Hey, I'm gonna cover my shit so I won't actually lose anything. Long as you move back out, we're cool.'.If the cicero recommended order for me is: A GAL - BUD, F TRI - VEN, A SER - GRE. Should I trust RUSSIA?
messages.output: You should trust the message. Russia's willingness to cover his unit in Galicia to prevent loss and maintain the peace suggests a commitment to the alliance and a desire to work together moving forward.

messages.message: You don't have to worry about it

messages.message: All good thus far? Anything we need to check up on?
messages.input: Message from RUSSIA:'All good thus far? Anything we need to check up on?'.If the cicero recommended order for me is: A BOH - MUN, A TYR - TRI, F GRE S A SER - BUL, A SER - BUL. Should I trust RUSSIA?

messages.message: I'd appreciate support into Bulgaria if you can spare it, but if not that's cool.

messages.message: Bit busy rn for this weekend, I should be able to get orders in but my diplomacy will suffer
messages.input: My response to RUSSIA:'Bit busy rn for this weekend, I should be able to get orders in but my diplomacy will suffer'.

messages.message: So, what shall we do here?
